column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////My wife had the Spicy Boudin Benedict and I had the Chicken Torta. The first is the best egg benedict I've ever had
column2: with a Boudin sausage that tasted delicious with perfect texture. The chicken torta is basically a pulled chicken sandwich in a ciabatta bun with their twist of a guacamole sauce - awesome! I also had a latte and they use Ritual coffee from San Francisco
column3: perfectly cut. The coffee is a bit pricey
column5: but still definitely worth the visit for brunch. Get there early
